GenQActor

BASIC DEPENDENCIES

The application project must include the following dependencies:

    it.unibo.iss.libs\libs\unibo

  • uniboInterfaces.jar basic interface used by the platform
  • uniboEnvBaseAwt.jar GUI based custom framework
  • unibonoawtsupports.jar TCP-UDP-Serialcommunication support
  • 2p301.jar tuPolog version 3.1 (java8)
  • qactors18.jar qactor infrastructure
    •

MORE INTERACTION

  • it.unibo.iss.libs\libs\http\nanoHttp.jar for hhtp web-socket server
  • it.unibo.iss.libs\libs\rxJava\rxjava-core-0.18.4.jar for serial communications
    •

The QA-IDE creates code in the following directories:

src-gen

Java code of the main program (context) and the basic rules used by the run-time actor platform:
sysRules.pl

src

Java code of the QActors and for other entities (EventHandlers, Tasks) to be defined by the application designer. The generated code is created only once, to avoid the loss of modifications done by the application designer. To overcome this behavior, the -regeneratesrc flag can be used 
System <name> -regeneratesrc
.

srMore ()

For each context (in the context package):

SYSTEM CONFIGURATION file (systemName.pl)
web server files ( css, html, js)
for each QActor (in the QActor package):
plans.txt
WorddTheory.pl

MAIN program for each Context (e.g. named CtxYyy) of the system, the custom IDE generated a main Java program:
src-gen/actorPackage/MainCtxYyy.java

In INTERPRETED mode, a standard behavior is generated for each actor (e.g. QaXxx) in
src-gen/actorPackage/QaXxxInterpreted.java
that makes reference to the file
srcMore/actorPackage/plans.txt At the end of the execution, the following message is shown on the Console USER>: to end press 'e'
In this way the user can restart the system with the possibility to do some manual change in srcMore/actorPackage/plans.txt.
